description: Schema to validate the content of the distro_packages_repos var for apt

uri.description: URI of the repository to add.

components.description: Components of the repository to add, e.g. 'main' or 'stable'.

suite.description: Suite (codename) of the distro to add the repository for, e.g. 'jammy' or 'bookworm'. Will be computed if set to 'auto'.

architecture.description: Architecture for the repository to add, e.g. 'arm64' or 'i386'. Will be computed if set to 'auto'.

key_url.description: URL to download the repository key from.

dearmor_key.description: Whether to dearmor the repository key, or not. If you are unsure, set to 'false'.
